name: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing II: Pigasus
summary: What is this strange creature? A pig who can fly? A flying machine that looks like a pig? It doesn't matter, really: the Pigasus is the true wonder of weird science, created to explore the depths of the murky Otherworld - and retrieve information from the world beyond, not to mention the large amounts of extremely rare artifacts. Spend some precious Essence, summon this strange creature to your Lair... and buy some rare new items from the Pigasus!
